>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pulls/{number}/merge"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



合并Pull Request

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"merge_method":{"type":"string","description":"可选。合并PR的方法，merge（合并所有提交）、squash（扁平化分支合并）和rebase（变基并合并）。默认为merge。"}},"title":"PullRequestMergeReq"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"sha":{"type":"string","description":"sha"},"merged":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否合并"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"信息"}},"title":"PullRequestMergeResp"}}},"headers":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
